article_title: Google Maps Now Shows Nearby Takeout and Delivery Options
article_description: Ordering in or picking up dinner  Google Maps has been updated with two search filters that highlight nearby takeout and delivery options  The new search options are officially available on Android and iOS in the US  Canada and France  but users in other coun
